articles.title: 70-day Campaign Recorded in History of WPK
articles.content:
70-day Campaign Recorded in History of WPK
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Recorded in the history of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is a 70-day campaign for socialist construction, which was conducted in Juche 63 (1974) to carry out the six-year (1971-1976) national economic development plan ahead of schedule.
					 At that time, the successful fulfillment of the national economic plan for 1974 was a precondition to pushing ahead with the socialist construction in the country on a higher stage.
					
					 Under the guidance of the WPK, the 70-day campaign was launched in all sectors of the national economy in late October that year.  Detailed measures were taken to give full play to the mental power of all the people out in the campaign and bring it to success.
					
					 After all, the DPRK witnessed a rapid progress in the socialist economic construction. In the period of the campaign, the speed of 70-day campaign, a new Chollima Speed, was created, whereby more than 1 100 industrial establishments carried out their six-year plans two years earlier.
					
					 The country's industrial production in 1974 increased by 17.2 percent over the previous year and the gross industrial outputs for November and December went up 48 percent and 52 percent respectively compared with the same period of the previous year.
					
					 The slogan "Let us produce, study and live like the anti-Japanese guerrillas!", set forth by leader Kim Jong Il in March 1974, served as a mental source encouraging all the people to work great miracles and feats in all spheres of socialist economic construction during the campaign.

articles.title: Project for Unjong High-Tech Development Park Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Project for Unjong High-Tech Development Park Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is accelerating the project for Unjong High-Tech Development Park.
					 The Unjong High-Tech Development Park began to be formed in some parts of Unjong District, Pyongyang City, under the July Juche 103 (2014) decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 According to Ri Mun Ho, vice-director of the Unjong High-Tech Industry Company, it is their goal to turn the Unjong science area into a model of the nation's knowledge-based economy building, a high-tech development park with strong competitive power in Northeast Asia. 
					
					 A work now goes on at the final stage to draw out the master plan for the development of the park and regulations for its establishment and operation. Meanwhile, efforts are paid to establishing the Unjong IT Company and the Ryugyong Software Company, opening Internet homepage, building an international sci-tech exchange house and creating a model joint venture enterprise.
					
					 The Unjong science area is very favorable for establishing the high-tech development park as it has national scientific institutes and University of Sciences as well as experience in developing and manufacturing high-tech products. The place is also easy of access as Pyongyang International Airport and Nampho Port are within tens of kilometers from it.
					
					 At present, not a few foreign investors have expressed their interest in the development of the park.

articles.title: Book for Fast-Reading Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Book for Fast-Reading Published in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Book "Fast Reading for Brain Development" was published by the Korea Publications Export and Import Corporation.
					 The book in six volumes deals with the methods of basic training, education of children, mental arithmetic, memorization and reading.
					
					 The book is enjoying great popularity among kindergartners and schoolchildren.

articles.title: National Circus of DPRK
articles.content:
National Circus of DPRK
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- On the International Women's Day, the National Circus gave a performance at the Pyongyang Circus Theater, drawing great admiration from audience.
					 The circus, known as one of world's famous circuses, boasts of a long tradition.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung initiated the founding of a national acrobatic troupe on March 5, Juche 41 (1952) when the country was in the state of war, regarding the development of acrobatics as an important part in the overall development of the nation's art.
					
					 And he clarified such issues as finding out and developing traditional acrobatic pieces as required by the times, selecting and training acrobats and providing facilities and took measures for them.
					
					 In the first year after foundation, the troupe created 11 acrobatic pieces, including "Rope Walking", "Foot Tricks" and "On Iron Wire", making performance tours of the front and the rear.
					
					 The circus has proved successful at many international circus festivals.
					
					 This year alone, its acrobats were awarded gold prizes at the 39th Monte Carlo International Acrobatic Festival in Monaco and the Gold Elephant Prize at the 4th Figueras International Circus Festival.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Joint Slogans under Uplifted Banner of Self-Reliance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Joint Slogans under Uplifted Banner of Self-Reliance
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Self-reliance is a glorious tradition and banner of victory for the Korean revolution. All officials, party members and other working people should give full play to the might of self-reliance in the efforts to implement the joint slogans of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea. Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an editorial. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The history of building a rich and powerful country over seven decades can be characterized by self-reliance in a word.
					
					 In the days of building socialism by their own efforts, the Korean people underwent unprecedentedly great difficulties and ordeals but they enjoyed all sorts of honor unimaginable in the history of the nation spanning thousands of years.
					
					 Had the DPRK abandoned the principle of self-reliance, yielding to outsiders' pressure, Juche-based socialism could not have been built on the earth and the name of the DPRK would have been eclipsed with the collapse of the world socialist system.
					
					 Fullest play is given to the Korean nation-first spirit and mental power based on national self-esteem in the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK is frustrating all the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers with powerful war deterrent for self-defense built with much effort and making a high-pitched drive for breaking through the latest science and technology and updating everything in Korean style. This is the stirring reality of Songun Korea.
					
					 The Korean people showed their mettle to the U.S. imperialists in the period of the great Chollima upswing though they blustered that Korea could not rise up on its feet for a hundred years. Koreans made the Arduous March, forced march, weathering the most stern test of history by themselves. The world will clearly witness how Songun Korea will tower high, meeting all challenges of the imperialist reactionaries and overcoming manifold ordeals just as they did in those days.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Actions to Foil U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Drills against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Actions to Foil U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Drills against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- It was entirely just that the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a recent statement called upon all Koreans and the world peace-loving people to turn out in the struggle to resolutely check and foil the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group's nuclear war drills for invading the north, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The grave situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula is attributable to the U.S. heinous moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and saber-rattling.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the south Korean puppet forces are frantically escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north, backed by the U.S.
					
					 It is needless to say that a nuclear war will break out on the peninsula if the Koreans remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. and puppet warmonger's criminal war moves getting evermore dangerous.
					
					 It is impossible to defend the security of the nation and improve the inter-Korean relations as long as outside forces and pro-U.S. sycophants and lackeys are allowed to persist in their moves to ignite a war against the north. This is the lesson taught by the present situation. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations cannot become a scapegoat of the U.S. imperialist aggressors and their stooges' moves to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 Painful national division and history of the north-south stand-off should never be allowed to go on. 
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should turn out as one in the nation-wide patriotic struggle to check and foil the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group's saber-rattling leading the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Songun Politics and Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Songun Politics and Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics and the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea are the most effective and just political mode and strategic line to invariably preserve the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation and firmly defend socialism, irrespective of any change in situation and structure of relations, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 What is important in the strategic option decisive of the destiny of the country and the nation is not to pin hope on structure of international relations or on other countries and regional and international organizations but to believe in their own strength and adhere to the principle of independence.
					
					 Now that the imperialists are becoming evermore undisguised in their moves to stifle the DPRK, it will more firmly stick to the Songun politics and line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 No matter how the international situation may change and the structure of relations between neighboring countries may alter, the DPRK will not care about those matters.
					
					 The prevailing situation where the U.S. and its satellite forces have gone to extremes in their moves against the DPRK requires it to bolster up the army and national power in every way.
					
					 The Korean revolution has emerged victorious, relying on the strength of the people and adhering to the principle of independence.   This history and the present international situation go to clearly prove how just and effective the Songun politics and the above-said line are.
					
					 No force on earth can block the strategic option of the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Is Following in Footsteps of Fascist Germany: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Is Following in Footsteps of Fascist Germany: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is following in the footsteps of fascist Germany whose fate was like fallen leaves for its crimes, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The U.S. is regarding military muscle and dollar-dominated international financial system as important mainstays for realizing its scenario for world domination, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 However, these two mainstays are collapsing.
					
					 Military muscle it regards as all-powerful proves ineffective. In the past the U.S. imposed its will on other countries as it pleased by counting on its military muscle. But it does not work at present. Not a few countries are standing against it.
					
					 The same is true of its relations with its allies. In the past they were obliged to obey what it said. But the situation has changed. The position of dollar, one of the strategic mainstays of the U.S. for dominating the world, is rapidly sinking.
					
					 The U.S. is now resorting to the method of binding national currencies to dollar by abusing the present international financial system.
					
					 Not a few countries have already suffered losses due to it. That is why many countries are working hard to get rid of the above-said international financial system.
					
					 Racial, national and religious discriminations are very serious in the U.S., escalating social contradictions.
					
					 Many Americans are resorting to extreme actions, discontent with the unreasonable policies and social system which have driven them into wretched plight. 
					
					 It admits of no argument that the U.S. is bound to go to ruin.

articles.title: Ssangyong Landing Operation Drill to Be Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ssangyong Landing Operation Drill to Be Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers are set to stage Ssangyong landing operation drill as part of Foal Eagle joint military exercises from late March to early April, according to the south Korean Yonhap News. 
					 To be involved in the drill are thousands of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, the south Korean marines and three U.S. landing craft including a landing transport craft of the U.S. Navy in Sasebo Port of Japan. 
					
					 The south Korean military warmongers together with the U.S. aggression forces staged joint landing exercise during the RSOI and Foal Eagle joint military drills in 2006. At that time they openly said that they decided to stage landing operation to directly press and isolate Pyongyang.
					
					 The dangerous joint military drills aiming at a surprise preemptive attack, "liquidation" of the headquarters of the DPRK and "occupation of Pyongyang" clearly show the aggressive nature of the nuclear war moves for invading the north. 
					
					 The situation of the Korean peninsula is inching close to the brink of war day by day owing to the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK which has reached a dangerous phase of implementation and war hysteria of the south Korean warmongers.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Racket to Eliminate "Forces Following North"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Racket to Eliminate "Forces Following North"
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty, the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and other civic and social organizations of south Korea held a press conference before the puppet Seoul Central District Court on March 9 denouncing the authorities' racket for eliminating the "forces following the north", according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Ilbo.
					 Kim Jun Song, room chief of the solidarity, said that the prosecution's indictment against Hwang Son, representative of the Forum for the Study of Politics Desired, is peppered with sheer lies.
					
					 Kwon O Hon, honorary chairman of the association, said that just was the speech made by Hwang Son though the prosecution takes issue with it because she called for putting an end to national division and achieving reunification.
					
					 Yun Ki Jin, co-chairman of the solidarity, deplored that pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese acts are bringing the south Korean society to ruin.
					
					 He urged the present regime to stop racket for eliminating the "forces following the north."
					
					 A letter of protest demanding Hwang's release was read out. 
					
					 It is infringement upon freedom of expression to punish anyone who tells what one saw, heard and felt oneself by labeling it "appraisal of the north," the letter noted.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Slam Reckless Remarks of U.S. Undersecretary of State for Political Affairs
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Slam Reckless Remarks of U.S. Undersecretary of State for Political Affairs
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and civic and social organizations of south Korea held a press conference before the U.S. embassy in Seoul on March 4. They denounced the reckless remarks made by the U.S. undersecretary of State for Political Affairs shielding Japan's past war crimes.
					 His remarks are rubbing salt into the wounds of south Koreans and fanning up Japan's moves to revive militarism, they said, adding:
					
					 This reveals the U.S. intention to use Japan for realizing its ambition for domination.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to make apology for his outbursts.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Censured for "Eliminating Followers of North"
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Censured for "Eliminating Followers of North"
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Christian Churches in a commentary on Wednesday accused the regime of getting desperate in its racket for "eliminating the followers of the north" in the wake of the case of knife attack on the U.S. ambassador, according to south Korean CBS.
					 The police's investigation into the case has been focused on "finding forces behind followers of the north", the commentary held, adding:
					
					 We can hardly repress our concern over the police's move to scale up their investigation into those devoting themselves to the movement for national reunification and democracy and into personages concerned of the Council of Christian Churches.
					
					 The political camp should not abuse the case for instituting the "law on human rights in the north" and the "law on preventing terrorism" and deploying THAAD.

articles.title: Grenade Explosion Accident in S. Korea
articles.content:
Grenade Explosion Accident in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A grenade blew up in a drill ground of the south Korean puppet army in Rinje, south Korean Kangwon Province on March 9, leaving four soldiers wounded, according to south Korean KBS.
					 Similar accident occurred in a drill ground of the puppet marines in September last year, causing casualties.

articles.title: Japanese Ultra-Right Forces Slammed for Justifying Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japanese Ultra-Right Forces Slammed for Justifying Its Past Crimes
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. and members of a Japanese progressive organization staged an action in New York on Mar. 9 to denounce the Japanese ultra-right forces for justifying the crimes of sexual slavery by the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 "The Citizens' Society against Special Privilege of Koreans in Japan", a notorious Japanese ultra-right conservative organization, planned to give a lecture to justify Japan's history of aggression that day.
					
					 The protesters held a meeting in front of the venue of the lecture in order to check the reckless moves of the Japanese ultra-right conservative organization that let loose a spate of invectives labeling the victims of the sexual slavery as "prostitutes", lashing the world people into fury.
					
					 They condemned the "Citizens' Society against Special Privilege of Koreans in Japan" for taking the lead in misleading the public opinion in a bid to distort and deny the Japan's part history.
					
					 When the ultra-right conservative gangsters moved the venue of the lecture to other place, the protesters held a meeting again before that place.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by German Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by German Organization
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website an article titled "Invincible mettle of Comrade Kim Jong Un" on March 6.
					The article said that he is the outstanding commander of Mt. Paektu possessed of matchless grit and guts, invincible strategy and tactics and commanding art. It noted:
					
					The U.S. and south Korea started the joint military drills for aggression, tightening the collusion and tie-up in a foolish and undisguised manner in a bid to "bring down" the DPRK.
					
					This threw a stumbling block in the way of the DPRK in its efforts to bring about a turning phase for the improvement of the north-south relations and created a danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					However, the service personnel and people of the DPRK are not afraid of this at all.
					
					Kim Jong Un, peerless strategist and brilliant Songun commander well versed in modern warfare, has the enemies under his thumb with decisive resolution and merciless attack.
					
					The article conveyed the news that he gave field guidance to the work of the Korean People's Army in January this year.
					
					The U.S. and its followers will face merciless strikes of the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army which does not make an empty talk, the article added.

articles.title: Austrian Body Calls for Stop to War Drills against DPRK
articles.content:
Austrian Body Calls for Stop to War Drills against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria sent a letter to the U.S. embassy in Vienna on Mar. 6 in protest against the joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces.
					 The committee received with bitter indignation the news that the Obama administration started DPRK-targeted Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises together with the south Korean authorities, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. reacted to the DPRK's call for defusing tense situation on the Korean peninsula with drills for a war of aggression.
					
					 Military exercises in south Korea would push the situation in the region to the biggest danger of war.
					
					 We demand the U.S. government stop the war drills at once.
					
					 The committee also sent a protest letter calling for immediately stopping the joint military exercises and coming out for inter-Korean dialogue to the south Korean puppet embassy in Vienna on the same day.

articles.title: French Organization Condemns U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills
articles.content:
French Organization Condemns U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association posted on its website an article condemning the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills on March 3.
					 Dealing with the scale and aggressive nature of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills, the article said:
					
					 A spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army in a statement clarified its principled stand on the saber-rattling.
					
					 The DPRK has already clarified its stand that it has the willingness to put a moratorium on the nuclear test, a concern of the U.S., in case the latter stops its joint military drills for the time being. 
					
					 The U.S. turned down this proposal and Obama declared "additional sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 True dialogue is the most urgent for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of the world.

articles.title: Photo and Book Exhibition on DPRK Held in Brazil
articles.content:
Photo and Book Exhibition on DPRK Held in Brazil
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting to hear about the visit to the DPRK by the delegation of the Brazilian Communist Party and a photo and book exhibition took place in Espirito Santo State on March 4. 
					 On display at the venue of the events were photos documenting revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. Also displayed there were famous works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books on their greatness, photos and books introducing the service personnel and people of the DPRK working hard to build a thriving socialist nation and true picture of Songun Korea and books written by the above-said delegation and photos taken by it. 
					
					 At the meeting the secretary in charge of organizational affairs of the Espirito Santo State Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party informed its attendants of the DPRK visit last year. 
					
					 He praised the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu for performing the undying exploits to go down in the history of the victorious Korean revolution. 
					
					 He noted that people's political rights and right to existence are guaranteed legally and institutionally and everyone enjoys a happy life thanks to universal 12-year compulsory education and free health care and other benevolent policies in the DPRK. 
					
					 All the Korean people closely united around the party and the leader are struggling to protect the socialist system chosen and built by themselves, he said, and went on:
					
					 This eye-catching reality of the DPRK is ascribable to the wise steersmanship of the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Visiting the DPRK, we saw for ourselves the changes that took place in a short span of time under the leadership of First Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Immensely rosy is the future of the DPRK led by him.

articles.title: Zona de desarrollo de tecnologias de punta de Unjong
articles.content:
Zona de desarrollo de tecnologias de punta de Unjong
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- En julio del 103 (2014) de la Era Juche, fue promulgado el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de crear en algunas porciones del capitalino municipio de Unjong una zona de desarrollo de tecnologias de punta.
					Segun el vicepresidente de la Compania de la Industria de Tecnologias de Punta de Unjong, Ri Mun Ho, se ha trazado la meta de desarrollar la zona cientifica de Unjong como la ejemplar para la construccion de la economia de conocimientos del pais y la de desarrollo de tecnologias de punta con alta competitividad en el Noreste Asiatico.
					
					Esta en etapa final la elaboracion del plan de desarrollo general, que preve la construccion de vialidad, suministro de electricidad, comunicaciones, etc., y de las normas de fundacion y administracion de la zona de desarrollo.
					
					Se impulsan el establecimiento de la Agencia de IT de Unjong, la Agencia de Tecnologia de Programacion de Ryugyong, la inauguracion de la pagina web, la construccion del Pabellon Internacional de Intercambio de Ciencias y Tecnologias y la fundacion de la empresa comanditaria y asociada de modelo.
					
					La zona cientifica de Unjong es evaluada como region favorable para fundar y desarrollar la zona de desarrollo de tecnologias de punta.
					
					Estan situados alli los organos de investigacion de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias y la Universidad de Ciencias Naturales, lo cual permite solucionar el importante problema de recursos humanos.
					
					En la IT, nanotecnologia, biotecnologia y otras ramas se lograron valiosos exitos de investigacion y las experiencias de haber desarrollado y producido los articulos sofisticados, asi que se ha sentado cierta base para fundar la zona de desarrollo donde se realizaran simultaneamente la investigacion, el desarrollo, la produccion y la venta.
					
					Ademas, pasan por ahi las carreteras y las vias ferroviarias principales del pais y a decenas de kilometros de distancia, se encuentran el aeropuerto internacional de Pyongyang y el puerto de Nampho.
					
					Crece cada dia mas la atencion a la zona de los inversionistas extranjeros.

articles.title: Politica de Songun y linea de desarrollo paralelo son justas, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Politica de Songun y linea de desarrollo paralelo son justas, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- La politica de Songun y la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, presentadas por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, devienen el modo politico y linea estrategica mas poderosos y justos que permiten defender con firmeza la soberania y la dignidad del pais y la nacion y el socialismo bajo cualquier situacion y correlacion de fuerzas.
					Lo importante en la opcion estrategica, que decide el destino del pais y la nacion, es apoyarse en las fuerzas propias y mantener los principios de independencia sin abrigar esperanza en la estructura de relaciones internacionales o en otro pais, region y organizaciones internacionales.
					
					Puesto que las maniobras de los imperialistas tendentes a aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se tornan mas brutales que nunca, ella mantendra mas firme la politica de Songun y la linea de desarrollo paralelo.
					
					La RPDC no hace caso del cambio de la situacion internacional ni de la estructura de relaciones del contorno.
					
					La realidad de hoy en que llegan al extremo las maniobras hostiles anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y las fuerzas satelites, demanda fortalecer las fuerzas armadas y consolidar el poderio del pais.
					
					La historia de la revolucion coreana que salio victoriosa apoyandose en las fuerzas del pueblo y manteniendo los principios de independencia y la situacion internacional de hoy comprueban que la politica de Songun y la linea del desarrollo paralelo son muy justas y poderosas.
					
					Nadie puede impedir la opcion estrategica de la RPDC.

articles.title: EE.UU. repite el destino de Alemania fascista, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. repite el destino de Alemania fascista, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos esta repitiendo el destino de la Alemania fascista sepultada en la historia como consecuencia de sus crimenes cometidos contra la humanidad.
					Insiste asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado hoy y prosigue:
					
					La fuerza militar y el sistema financiero internacional con el dolar como divisa principal son para EE.UU. dos pilares para realizar su ambicion de dominar el mundo. 
					
					En estos tiempos, resulta impotente la fuerza militar que el imperio considera como medio todopoderoso. 
					
					Anteriormente, imponia sus criterios a otros paises esgrimiendo el garrote militar. 
					
					Pero, en la actualidad, no pocos paises, inclusive los paises aliados, se oponen a los dictados del imperio. 
					
					Por otra parte, se debilita a un ritmo acelerado la posicion del dolar, uno de los pilares estrategicos de EE.UU. para la hegemonia mundial. 
					
					Actualmente, ese pais emplea el metodo de subordinar las monedas nacionales de otros paises al dolar aprovechando el actual sistema financiero internacional, del cual han sido victimas no pocos paises.
					
					Por eso, crece el numero de los paises que tratan de liberarse de ese sistema.
					
					Ademas, son muy serias en EE.UU. las practicas de discriminacion racial, nacional y religiosa que agravan las contradicciones sociales.
					
					No pocos estadounidenses incurren en acciones extremistas guardando resentimiento de la politica injusta de las autoridades y del regimen social.
					
					Es indiscutible que se acerca el arruinamiento de EE.UU.
